website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and contemporary design, this smart speaker is a great addition to your home audio system but can also be taken out with you and used as a portable Bluetooth speaker.
pros: This compact speaker is filled with dual 7.5W acoustic drivers with a frequency response of 50Hz-20KHz offering great sound and allowing for plenty of volume
Install the Cowin app for full wireless control
Compatible with Alexa when on a WiFi network
cons: Doesn't support the Pandora streaming service

customer_reviews.title: Charge before trying to set up
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the negative reviews... I bought Cowin headphones and loved them, so I decided to give these speakers a try. Love them! This is not an echo replacement so do not listen to the reviews that try to put these speakers down because this is not the echo. Great sound quality and easy wifi and Bluetooth setup. I have 2 of these and I use them together for a great stereo experience. I use Spotify and my own music collection. Great deal and great music quality
customer_reviews.author: John Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality speaker. The sound quality is excellent. It’s clear and loud no crackling. I was surprised how loud it was when it turned on. This speaker is made well and has a good looking design. The price was also lower then some of the other speakers I looked at. Overall good deal and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as convenient as hands-free Alexa.....but the sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: You do have to touch the button on top in order to talk to Alexa. It doesn't light up with colors (notifications) like Alexa. Sometimes it has more trouble connecting to WiFi than Alexa. However, the sound is good. And most important for me--it's chargeable. That means no cords and outlet required, so it's wonderful to keep on the outdoor patio table. Just waiting out there for us when we want to listen to music, have a glass of wine, and watch the sunset.
customer_reviews.author: JcatTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing for its size. Defiantly buy from this company again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the COWIN DiDa as a replacement for my aging Amazon Tap. It came time to start using my COWIN DiDa because the Tap battery life is no good. The COWIN DiDa seems to be really high quality build. My surprise when I tried to get it to work on my network with strange issues. Contacted their support site and received responses quickly and when they could not resolve it they replaced it promptly it no question. This item was almost 2 years old. The new one works and sounds amazing for its size. Defiantly buy from this company again
customer_reviews.author: snuggles

customer_reviews.title: Wifi didn't work.  Now it is dead.
customer_reviews.text: October 2019, 10 months after purchase, update: The wifi quit long ago on this speaker but it worked as a bluetooth speaker. Now it won't even turn on. Into the garbage it goes. Don't waste your money. This is an ok bluetooth speaker but the wifi doesnt work. Support is nonexistent unless you count an error message saying i have the wrong email address. Spend half the money and get a nicer bluetooth speaker or spend the same amount and get an Alexa device that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Fan

customer_reviews.title: Sing-a-Long
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I have been after for years! I have a great Hi-Fi system (Cary Tubes; English Horn Speakers) and have a variety of Bluetooth speakers which are a fiddle to use and inconsistent in performance. This Cowin speaker is easy to set up; links well to Alexa; can play all my favourite musicians ( plus others that I have not thought about for years! ); and it sounds so good that I don't just listen - I sing-along! Enjoyable for me; maybe not for others!!!
customer_reviews.author: Callam

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, awful Alexa!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Not so great with Alexa. You have to manually touch a button to get Alexa to work. Great for adding to an echo dot by a speaker cord though. Very powerful speaker, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: JenT

customer_reviews.title: Totally Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: Does not (NOT) allow you to control it with Alexa. It is a decent Bluetooth speaker but will not allow you to control it from Alexa, to stream Amazon Music, Pandora, or any other than a few apps already built in. Save your money and buy a product that works with Amazon Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G

customer_reviews.title: All in one User friendly
customer_reviews.text: This item is so simple to use that anyone without tech experience can figure it out. But I must say there is nothing to figure out. I can have one in my office, kitchen, and bedroom with this affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: ANI

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to set up. Use it often. It has a wealth of knowledge stored. Ease of operation. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Milton O.

customer_reviews.title: Cowin Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was an overall good value. I was a little disappointed with the total volume that the speaker reaches. I have two other Bluetooth speakers that get much loader than this one. Alexa is a very nice added feature that I would say a good majority of Bluetooth speakers do not have. Overall I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: agill

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was easy to set up. Just follow the instructions on the smartphone app and you're ready to go. The sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Spallone

customer_reviews.title: Great Alexa capable speaker to replace the discontinued TAP
customer_reviews.text: I have a TAP Alexa speaker and wanted another. Unfortunately Amazon no longer sells them. COWIN to the rescue. This speaker works great and has an internal battery to allow use without a plugin.
customer_reviews.author: Gerb Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little speaker. I purchased a bluetooth record player to use with this speaker and the speaker surprise me with great quality and amazing sound. It definitely out performed my expectations. Can't beat the value to price.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Borders

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speaker... Great sound and Compact
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I bring it with me on all my travels. It has great sound, no distortion and compact size to fix in any carry on or suit case. Thanks you for this great product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MAD

customer_reviews.title: Great product highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker it’s solid and works flawlessly and has good range away from my router, I had it in my yard about 60’ way and had no issues at all with connection.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Speaker worked fantastic for about 18 months. It lost internet connection and when I reconnected it is said it was connected but when I go to use it is say not connected. I email customer service several times with no reply.....Customer service email me a new speaker an it works great. Great integration with Alexa that we can carry all around the house and yard.
customer_reviews.author: William Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Was not the sound quality I am accustom too.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality just was not there on this item. I was surprised due to I have purchased this brand of products before.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: Be aware: Can't use Spotify using Alexa
customer_reviews.text: That needs to be clear in the description, the device sounds ok but if you want to use Spotify through Alexa; search for another device. I am thinking about returning it because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo L Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: A great feature set
customer_reviews.text: The device is a great combination of features: Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity as well as support for Alexa and streaming audio. The rechargeable battery is good for several hours at least. The only slight minus is that, to my ear, the audio quality is good, but not as good as, say, the Bose alternative. That said, the additional features make this the right choice for people who want portable sound with lots of features when they are home.
customer_reviews.author: David Robinson

customer_reviews.title: You may need to send back
customer_reviews.text: I could not get the sound level out louder than a scratched record. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spain

customer_reviews.title: really good sound quality for such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time, really good sound quality for such a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT VOICE CONTROLLED
customer_reviews.text: POS Product. Not voice controlled without pushing a button. Won't connect to spotify from device. You have to connect to spotify on your phone and then play on your device. WTF is the point of that?
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was fantastic when we went camping last weekend. We have been using it by the fire, outside, and in the house. The sound is super clear and loud. The Alexa works perfectly as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Hard to configure
customer_reviews.text: Day 2, after multiple tries I have given up, instructions are poor and the system continues to fail to connect Unless you are a super techy person don’t waste your time or money with this
customer_reviews.author: David Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I have a hot tub outside and I use it with Alexa to listen to music
customer_reviews.author: Siggy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my speaker, its impressive for it's size and stays WiFi connected through my two story apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good for price but not as full featured as Alexa
customer_reviews.text: For the cost it works great. But it isn’t a full featured Alexa, so no routines and high end functions
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware!!! Doesn't come with Alexa function. Sending it back and its not worth $65 sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Mckey Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: This company has excellent service very impressed the product is easy to adjust and very portable It was a pleasure to deal with them Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I tried one and it didn’t work at all and the replacement wouldn’t connect to my Bluetooth or WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Snookie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, quality is good though but it’ll break right after a year
customer_reviews.text: This dida go dead by the end of the year so I just tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ho

customer_reviews.title: The speaker works as advertised, but the instructions are ...
customer_reviews.text: The speaker works as advertised, but the instructions are written very small and are difficult to read. I also had trouble pairing it to my Gen 1 Echo. They eventually paired but I can only get one of the speakers to work at a time. I had hoped to have the same music playing in multiple locations, but for now, it's not happening.
customer_reviews.author: Geary N Launder

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for a home office or bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. Setting it up is quirky but it worked after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Not what to be expected
customer_reviews.text: Product wont connect to wifi. Never works when we want it to! Not as good as Alexa products
customer_reviews.author: Russo Family

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Could not keep connected to Amazon kept disconnecting Contacted manufacture twice never got a response after a week returned item
customer_reviews.author: Robert Grell

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift and love it. The sound is fabulous. The charge lasts a long time and I’m loving the Amazon Prime Music.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage and the sound is like an old clock radio plus the app was terrible. Absolute horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Nate c

customer_reviews.title: and does not sound as good as the Echo
customer_reviews.text: Not hands free.....people, and does not sound as good as the Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: I like it but recently I heard some noise from that
customer_reviews.author: Farzaneh

customer_reviews.title: This company is fraud and I’m reporting them to BBB.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is defective and I only had it since March. It gets stuck and don’t work for 3 days. They took my $100 and now they saying no refund. Wow!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: The DiDa has been great. It works great, sounds great and I love the portability of it.
customer_reviews.author: Karley

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for being so small. Powerful, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: terrific
customer_reviews.text: plays music plays messages easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Renne R. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive alternative to Amazon device
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality in a small package and the Alexa integration is great
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wert

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this speaker at cookouts all the time, great sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, perfect for home use. I also take it on outdoor trips, works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: jose a vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We love this speaker! Use it on the pool deck, inside, camping!
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, so portable, long lasting charge
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. I take wherever I work around the house or yard.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Natusch

customer_reviews.title: Petite and fancy Alexa bluetooth speaker with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Impressive sound quality and connectivities. This sound is petite and fancy. It's existence highlighted my living room. I love it. The connection is easy. Just install the apps from app store, pair your speaker to your network and you are good to go. You could control it through Alexa or you could simply control it using the apps directly. You could press the button and talk to it for instruction. You could also just pair it through bluetooth to use it as a bluetooth speaker. However you want to use it, it's capable.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very good small speaker's. Great sound for the size. The app is pretty solid, had another brand that didn't work all the time returned. Just wish they had Google music and Pandora half a star reduction for somewhat limited choices. Use a 1amp 5v USB for wall plug (doesn't come with). I bought 6 so far for around the house sound.
customer_reviews.author: B. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little speaker but it's pretty quite
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little speaker but it's pretty quite. Plus it doesn't support Spotify on wifi just Bluetooth. Voice service is cool. Probably be a lot better linking two or three together which is cool, but again for the price I was expecting a little more sound.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time, just as described. I would ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, just as described. I would have given it a 5 star but I use pandora a lot and this item is not compatible with pandora.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. Update review on this gadget: It stopped working already. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Elpidio Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for the price!!!! I love that is ALEXA compatible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jluis Leon

customer_reviews.title: I just got today I loved the voice control very nice very easy and sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got today I loved the voice control very nice very easy and sounds good too , good stuff in your life 😊
customer_reviews.author: yan che

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. I gave to my family member as a gift and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I take it outside and listen to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! I take it outside and listen to music while i work in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: Would be great!!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased two of these for multi-room music and set them up. They work pretty good but I have issue with the fact that pandora isn't available with the app even though it shows up on screen shots. not sure why they don't have it available but kind of a deal breaker for me. I'll keep them in hopes that they update the app to offer that option.
customer_reviews.author: Explorerintx

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works well, sound is great, stereo sound is a nice plus on such a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to connect to your phone via Bluetooth or Aux line. Sound quality is better than I thought. Max volume is definitely enough to use indoor or even outdoor. Need to download the Cowin app in order to use Voice control.
customer_reviews.author: K

product_meta.title: COWIN DiDa with Amazon Alexa Bluetooth Speakers, Smart Wireless Wifi Portable Bluetooth Speaker 15W Output Power with Enhanced Bass- Black
product_meta.description:
Technical Details

Size: 6.04" x 3.67" x 3.67" (153 mm x 93 mm x 93 mm)

Weight: 1.04 lb. (473 grams) Actual size and weight may vary by manufacturing process

Battery Life: Up to 9 hours of continuous playback. Battery life will vary based on device settings, usage, and environmental factors. Actual results may vary.

Included in the Box: COWIN DiDa Bluetooth speakers, Micro USB cable, 3.5mm audio cable, user guide

Warranty and Service: 12 months product warranty + 6 months extension after product registration, 24/7 technical support and friendly customer service.

COWIN DiDa is Bluetooth-enabled so you can stream other popular music services like iTunes from your phone or tablet. DiDa has been fine-tuned to deliver crisp vocals with dynamic bass response. Its Dual stereo speakers and dual passive radiators produce omni-directional audio to fill any room with immersive sound.

When connected to Wi-Fi you can access Alexa, you control with your voice. DiDa connects to the Alexa Voice Service to play music, make calls, send and receive messages, provide information, news, sports scores, weather, and more—instantly. All you have to do is ask.

Just sign in to your customer account in the COWIN App to access personalized features and enable Alexa Skills.

Step 1: Install COWIN App available on iOS or Android onto your device to set up and manage your COWIN DiDa speaker. (Please search "cowin" in google play)

Step 2: Follow the instruction in the COWIN App and then connect to the Internet.Really easy to set up and use!

Step 3: Pair multiple speakers for a whole-home audio experience,or tap and ask Alexa to play music, weather, news, and more. For additional instructions please refer to the user manual.

If you have more than one COWIN DiDa, you can control them at the same time through the COWIN App. You can let two DiDa speaker play together or switch from one to the other.

With the free COWIN App on Fire OS, Android, iOS, and desktop browsers, you can easily setup and manage your DiDa. (Search "COWIN" in Google Play Store to download COWIN APP, if you have any question, just contact us for inquiry.)

warm Reminding:There have a User Guide in the product information,we will upload the latest version of the instruction, you can learn more detailed product introduction from this user guide.
feature_bullets: Alexa Voice Control: COWIN DiDa works as a Amazon certified Alexa voice-enabled speaker you control with your voice. DiDa connects to the Alexa Voice Service, just touch the microphone button and ask for music, hear news, search for information, order a pizza, and more—instantly. All you have to do is ask

Superior Sound Quality: With its dual 7.5-watt acoustic drivers and frequency response of 50Hz-20KHz, COWIN DiDa can stream loud and crystal clear stereo sound. Room filling powerful sound, perfect for home, dorm room, kitchen, car, parties; streaming music or internet radio services such as Airplay, DLNA ,Qplay ,Spotify
Ingenuity Design: the use of elegant fashion texture linen, simple and full of artistic sense that fits anywhere in your home. Touch the control screen, gently touch, play moving music

Small and Easy to Travel: built-in rechargeable battery, 24 hours a day play and party, up to 9 hours of continuous playback of audio. Note: The playback time varies depending on the volume and audio content. Easily stows away in your suitcase or your backpack so you can enjoy it wherever your travels take you

Control at Your Fingertips: Download the cowin App and take control of your music. Easily extend your home audio system with your home Wi-Fi simple setup.You'll enjoy seamless access to your favorite tracks and online music services. And you can customize sound settings and control multi-room listening. Play different songs at the same time in different rooms, or in different rooms simultaneously play the same song to amplify the listening experience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars164 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
